mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OFFLINE_MESSAGES(id, message_id, message, jid) VALUES(#{id}, #{messageId}, #{message}, #{jid, typeHandler=JabberIdTypeHandler})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OFFLINE_MESSAGES WHERE jid=#{0, typeHandler=JabberIdTypeHandler} LIMIT #{1} OFFSET #{2}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OFFLINE_MESSAGES WHERE jid=#{0, typeHandler=JabberIdTypeHandler}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM OFFLINE_MESSAGES WHERE jid=#{0, typeHandler=JabberIdTypeHandler} AND message_id=#{1}
